Philippine: Local elections were held under the 1987 Constitution of the Philippines.
Military reports that Col. Honasan, who led the August 1987 coup attempt, escapes from his prison ship in Manila Bay.
Comprehensive Agrarian Reform Program (CARP) is signed by Pres. Cojuangco–Aquino to provide land reform for Filipino farmers.
Interior Bases Agreement was signed by the Philippines and United States.
Ferry MV Doña Marilyn sinks off Leyte during a typhoon, killing 389.
